articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: What F1 GPS data reveals about Verstappen's Imola qualifying save - Autosport
articles.description: Max Verstappen’s eighth consecutive Formula 1 pole position - which equals Ayrton Senna's record - owes much to the tow he picked up from Haas driver Nico Hulkenberg – per the GPS data of Imola Q3’s final runs.
articles.content: Having been congratulated on his run of poles that stretches back to the 2023 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix by Red Bull team boss Christian Horner, Verstappen was left to reflect on how his tricky event was t… [+3557 chars]
